h2. My Desktop Buckets

{{html:
    <table ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="ListDesktopBucketsController" class="table table-striped table-bordered">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th></th>
                <th></th>
                <th>Email</th>
                <th>User type</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr ng-repeat="user in bucket.users">
                <td>
                    <a href="Main Office#/{[user.id]}">Edit Package</a>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <a href="Connecting">Manage</a>
                </td>
                <td>{[user.email]}</td>
                <td>{[user.userType]}</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
 }}
